verses.text_plain: These are the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,
verses.verse_html:
1These are the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun, ▼
▼ Israel: or, Jacob

verses.text_plain: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
verses.verse_html: 2Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.

verses.text_plain: The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: which three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the Lord; and he slew him.
verses.verse_html: 3The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: which three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the Lord; and he slew him.

verses.text_plain: And Tamar his daughter in law bare him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.
verses.verse_html: 4And Tamar his daughter in law bare him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.

verses.text_plain: The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.
verses.verse_html: 5The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.
verses.verse_html:
6And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all. ▼
▼ Zimri: or, Zabdi
 , ▼
▼ Dara: or, Darda

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.
verses.verse_html:
7And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed. ▼
▼ Achar: or, Achan

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.
verses.verse_html: 8And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.

verses.text_plain: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
verses.verse_html:
9The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai. ▼
▼ Ram: Gr. Aram
 , ▼
▼ Chelubai: or, Caleb

verses.text_plain: And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;
verses.verse_html: 10And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;

verses.text_plain: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
verses.verse_html:
11And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz, ▼
▼ Salma: also called, Salmon

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Salma: also called, Salmon

verses.text_plain: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,
verses.verse_html: 12And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,

verses.text_plain: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
verses.verse_html:
13And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third, ▼
▼ Shimma: or, Shammah

verses.text_plain: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
verses.verse_html: 14Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,

verses.text_plain: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:
verses.verse_html: 15Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:

verses.text_plain: Whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.
verses.verse_html: 16Whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.

verses.text_plain: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmeelite.
verses.verse_html:
17And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmeelite. ▼
▼ Jether…: also called, Ithra an Israelite

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Jether…: also called, Ithra an Israelite
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jether…: also called, Ithra an Israelite

verses.text_plain: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
verses.verse_html: 18And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.

verses.text_plain: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
verses.verse_html: 19And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.

verses.text_plain: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
verses.verse_html: 20And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.

verses.text_plain: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was threescore years old; and she bare him Segub.
verses.verse_html:
21And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was threescore years old; and she bare him Segub. ▼
▼ married: Heb. took

verses.text_plain: And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.
verses.verse_html: 22And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.

verses.text_plain: And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof, even threescore cities. All these belonged to the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.
verses.verse_html: 23And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof, even threescore cities. All these belonged to the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.

verses.text_plain: And after that Hezron was dead in Caleb–ephratah, then Abiah Hezron’s wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.
verses.verse_html: 24And after that Hezron was dead in Caleb–ephratah, then Abiah Hezron’s wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.
verses.verse_html: 25And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.

verses.text_plain: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.
verses.verse_html: 26Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.
verses.verse_html: 27And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
verses.verse_html: 28And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.

verses.text_plain: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.
verses.verse_html: 29And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.
verses.verse_html: 30And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.
verses.verse_html: 31And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.
verses.verse_html: 32And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
verses.verse_html: 33And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.

verses.text_plain: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.
verses.verse_html: 34Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.

verses.text_plain: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.
verses.verse_html: 35And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.

verses.text_plain: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
verses.verse_html: 36And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,

verses.text_plain: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
verses.verse_html: 37And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,

verses.text_plain: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
verses.verse_html: 38And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,

verses.text_plain: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
verses.verse_html: 39And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,

verses.text_plain: And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,
verses.verse_html: 40And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,

verses.text_plain: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
verses.verse_html: 41And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.

verses.text_plain: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
verses.verse_html: 42Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
verses.verse_html: 43And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.

verses.text_plain: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
verses.verse_html: 44And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.

verses.text_plain: And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Beth–zur.
verses.verse_html: 45And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Beth–zur.

verses.text_plain: And Ephah, Caleb’s concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.
verses.verse_html: 46And Ephah, Caleb’s concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
verses.verse_html: 47And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.

verses.text_plain: Maachah, Caleb’s concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.
verses.verse_html: 48Maachah, Caleb’s concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.

verses.text_plain: She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb was Achsah.
verses.verse_html: 49She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb was Achsah.

verses.text_plain: These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim,
verses.verse_html:
50These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim, ▼
▼ Ephratah: also called, Ephreth

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Ephratah: also called, Ephreth

verses.text_plain: Salma the father of Beth–lehem, Hareph the father of Beth–gader.
verses.verse_html: 51Salma the father of Beth–lehem, Hareph the father of Beth–gader.

verses.text_plain: And Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites.
verses.verse_html:
52And Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites. ▼
▼ Haroeh: or, Reaiah
 , ▼
▼ half…: or, half of the Menuchites, or, Hatsi–ham–menuchoth

footnotes.body_text: ▼ half…: or, half of the Menuchites, or, Hatsi–ham–menuchoth
footnotes.body_html: ▼ half…: or, half of the Menuchites, or, Hatsi–ham–menuchoth

verses.text_plain: And the families of Kirjath–jearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites.
verses.verse_html: 53And the families of Kirjath–jearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites.

verses.text_plain: The sons of Salma; Beth–lehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.
verses.verse_html:
54The sons of Salma; Beth–lehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites. ▼
▼ Ataroth…: or, Atarites, or, crowns of the house of Joab

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Ataroth…: or, Atarites, or, crowns of the house of Joab
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Ataroth…: or, Atarites, or, crowns of the house of Joab

verses.text_plain: And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
verses.verse_html: 55And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
